title: Tagging Workbench
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:bhl-dark-sidebar]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:centered-header-bhl]]

[[=]]
++ **This workbench is currently being utilized by the MAST Tagging team.**

++ **If you are reading this and not a member of MAST, this is the first thing you should read before tagging: [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/a-laymen-s-guide-to-tagging| A Laymen's Guide To Tagging]]].**
[[/=]]

~~~~~~~~
----

[[module ListPages category="_default adult theme component" rating=">=-1" order="created_atDsc" limit="100"  tags=" -admin -archived -artwork -artist -author -contest -creepypasta -essay -fragment -goi-format -guide -hub -in-deletion -redirect -resource -in-rewrite -news -orphaned -project -sandbox -scp -site -splash -supplement -tale -workbench -theme -component-backend -component -_theme-temp " categories="*" separate="no" perPage="250" order="created_at desc" prependLine="||~ Title ||~ Rating ||~ Comments ||~ Date Created ||"]]
|| **[[[%%link%%/noredirect/true | %%title%%]]]** || %%rating%% || %%comments%% || %%created_at%% ||
[[/module]]
~~~~~~~~
